abilities.name: Blessing of Wilderness
abilities.description: Blessing of WildernessAbilityBUFF Hilda regenerates 2% of her max HP per second while in the bush. When entering the bush, she gains a shield equal to 15% of her max HP. After leaving the bush, the shield lasts for 5s. This effect has a 10s cooldown.

abilities.name: Combat Ritual
abilities.description: Combat RitualAbilitySpeed Up AoETypePhysical Basic ATK Hilda activates the runic power of the great sword, increasing her Movement Speed by 60% for 3s and enhancing her next Basic Attack: It deals 200 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and slows the target by 40% for 3s. It also deals 120 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies behind the target. 10.0

abilities.name: Art of Hunting
abilities.description: Art of HuntingAbilityDamage CCTypePhysical Skill Hilda locks onto an enemy target, each time dealing 220 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage. Skill can be released 3 times at most. The 2nd attack will deal damage to target's surroundings, and the 3rd attack will knock back the target and surrounding enemies temporarily. 8.0

abilities.name: Power of Wildness
abilities.description: Power of WildnessAbilityBurst CCTypePhysical Skill Hilda launches a powerful slash on the target enemy, dealing them 600 (+250% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage and stunning them for 0.2s. Nearby enemies also take 60% damage. Hilda's Basic Attack and skill apply a mark on hit, each mark lasting up to 4s and allowing Power of Wildness to deal 2.5% of the target's Max HP as extra damage (up to 6 stacks). At max stacks, Power of Wildness deals 40% of the target's Max HP as extra damage and ignores 20% of their Physical Defense. 32.0
